content: I've had varying experiences with different airlines, and it seems like Delta's economy seats are on par with what I've seen from United and American Airlines. I'm relieved to hear that I'll have access to power outlets and USB ports, as I always seem to need to keep my devices charged during long flights. By the way, speaking of long flights, I recently flew business class with British Airways to London, and the lie-flat bed was amazing - it made all the difference on the long haul.
